title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
no water damage or other know damage...
i was replaced battery, but still drain very fast.
CPU getting very hot 100c, U7210 L2011/21/31 and all the area getting very hot..
was also tried OS from external drive to see if its not from the OS but the same
any idea?

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
Did you replace with known good battery?
Be aware of new chinese battery; you can't call them "known good".

I recommend you to get NLBA to test the batteries.
It can help you to recover some batteries; which can get blocked because of unballance, or overdischarge.
Can also reset error flags,  and change bad cells with it.
You can get in this way a better battery than a f***g new chinese one.

Any error pops up starting in Diagnostic mode?
Test using another heatsink; also change thermal paste.

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
I was put the board it good working body with original battery and it act the same.. fast fan and battery drain very fast!
dont have error at Diagnostic mode.
cant be bad CPU?
what else can i check?

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
Fans go fast from the beggining, or just when CPU (maybe GPU) gets hot?
Battery drain fast in both iGPU and dGPU modes?

Didn't speciy if you tested with another heatsink...

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 92058, member: 682"]
Fans go fast from the beggining, or just when CPU (maybe GPU) gets hot?
[/QUOTE]
just after its start to getting hot..

[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 92058, member: 682"]
Battery drain fast in both iGPU and dGPU modes?
[/QUOTE]
how do i switch?

[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 92058, member: 682"]
Didn't speciy if you tested with another heatsink...
[/QUOTE]
no, but you think it can drain the battery becouse of that? maybe it can down the temp 10-20deg but no to much....but i will check..

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
If no powerful graphics is required, board should work on iGPU mode.
Playing a video, may switch to dGPU.
Check if gfxcardstatus is supported on this machine.

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message: Its the CPU temp goes high.. when i open Terminal and write the "yes" command its start to get hot and fans goes high

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
Then should be internal CPU issue.

Same happenes if you test with battery alone?
Depending of the combination charger/battery detected, macOS should adjust several clocks.
This may be reflected in the machine behavior.

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 92158, member: 682"]
Same happenes if you test with battery alone?
[/QUOTE]
yes the same..
This is the picture of HW Monitor with just Terminal and YES command open.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://ibb.co/R37kgft[/URL]

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
Connect external monitor and test again.
This will enable dGPU, disabling iGPU.
Just to see if CPU still gets hot; expecting a problem on its iGPU area.

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message: I was connected to external screen, it’s the same, it’s getting hot just when the CPU start to work even little bit hard..

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
Then should be CPU core problem, not iGPU related.

Just in case, try DFU restore.
Don't forget to save data first.

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message:
did DFU still the same.. what else can i check?
At the picture is before I start the YES command at Terminal and after..
[URL unfurl="true"]https://ibb.co/M8sN1n3[/URL]

title: 820-01041 battery drain fast
message: Try installing original macOS, from Internet Recovery (Shift + Command + Option + R).
